Package com.IGallinari.LastGame.repository

Interface StatsPlayerRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<StatsPlayer,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<StatsPlayer,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<StatsPlayer,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<StatsPlayer,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<StatsPlayer,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<StatsPlayer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<StatsPlayer,Integer>
@Repository public interface StatsPlayerRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<StatsPlayer,Integer>
This interface represents the repository for managing StatsPlayer entities. It extends the JpaRepository interface provided by Spring Data JPA.

  • Method Details

    • findAvgStatsByIdPlayer

      @Query(value="SELECT AVG(sp.points),AVG(sp.assists),AVG(sp.totReb),AVG(sp.steals),AVG(sp.blocks) FROM statsplayer sp WHERE idPlayer=:inputIdPlayer", nativeQuery=true) List<Float[]> findAvgStatsByIdPlayer(@Param("inputIdPlayer") int idPlayer)
      Calculates the average statistics for a player based on their player ID.
      Parameters:
      idPlayer - The ID of the player for which to calculate average statistics.
      Returns:
      List of average statistics [average points, average assists, average total rebounds, average steals, average blocks].

    • findByTeamAndGameAndPlayer

      StatsPlayer findByTeamAndGameAndPlayer(Team team, Game game, Player player)
      Retrieves the stats for a specific team, game, and player.
      Parameters:
      team - The team for which to retrieve stats.
      game - The game for which to retrieve stats.
      player - The player for which to retrieve stats.
      Returns:
      The StatsPlayer object for the specified team, game, and player or null if not found.

    • findByTeamAndGame

      List<StatsPlayer> findByTeamAndGame(Team team, Game game)
      Retrieves a list of stats for a specific team and game.
      Parameters:
      team - The team for which to retrieve stats.
      game - The game for which to retrieve stats.
      Returns:
      List of StatsPlayer objects for the specified team and game.

    • findBestPlayerPointsByIdGameAndIdTeam

      @Query(value="SELECT idPlayer, points FROM statsplayer WHERE idGame = :inputIdGame AND idTeam = :inputIdTeam ORDER BY points DESC LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer[]> findBestPlayerPointsByIdGameAndIdTeam(@Param("inputIdGame") int idGame, @Param("inputIdTeam") int idTeam)
      Retrieves the player ID and points of the best player (the highest points) for a specific game and team.
      Parameters:
      idGame - The ID of the game for which to find the best player.
      idTeam - The ID of the team for which to find the best player.
      Returns:
      List of Integer arrays [player ID, points] for the best player in the specified game and team.

    • findBestPlayerTotRebByIdGameAndIdTeam

      @Query(value="SELECT idPlayer, totReb FROM statsplayer WHERE idGame = :inputIdGame AND idTeam = :inputIdTeam ORDER BY totReb DESC LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer[]> findBestPlayerTotRebByIdGameAndIdTeam(@Param("inputIdGame") int idGame, @Param("inputIdTeam") int idTeam)
      Retrieves the player ID and total rebounds of the best player (highest total rebounds) for a specific game and team.
      Parameters:
      idGame - The ID of the game for which to find the best player.
      idTeam - The ID of the team for which to find the best player.
      Returns:
      List of Integer arrays [player ID, total rebounds] for the best player in the specified game and team.

    • findBestPlayerAssistByIdGameAndIdTeam

      @Query(value="SELECT idPlayer, assists FROM statsplayer WHERE idGame = :inputIdGame AND idTeam = :inputIdTeam ORDER BY assists DESC LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer[]> findBestPlayerAssistByIdGameAndIdTeam(@Param("inputIdGame") int idGame, @Param("inputIdTeam") int idTeam)
      Retrieves the player ID and assists of the best player (The highest assists) for a specific game and team.
      Parameters:
      idGame - The ID of the game for which to find the best player.
      idTeam - The ID of the team for which to find the best player.
      Returns:
      List of Integer arrays [player ID, assists] for the best player in the specified game and team.

    • findDistinctTeamIds

      @Query(value="SELECT sp.idTeam FROM StatsPlayer sp LEFT JOIN Game g ON sp.idGame = g.id WHERE g.season=:season GROUP BY (sp.idTeam)", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> findDistinctTeamIds(@Param("season") int season)
      Retrieves a list of distinct team IDs for a specific season based on stats games.
      Parameters:
      season - The season for which to retrieve distinct team IDs.
      Returns:
      List of distinct team IDs for the specified season.

    • findSumStatsPlayerAndAvgPointsByIdPlayerAndSeason

      @Query(value="SELECT SUM(sp.fgm), SUM(sp.fga), SUM(sp.fgp), SUM(sp.ftm), SUM(sp.fta), SUM(sp.ftp), SUM(sp.tpm), SUM(sp.tpa), SUM(sp.tpp), SUM(sp.offReb), SUM(sp.defReb), SUM(sp.totReb), SUM(sp.assists), SUM(sp.pFouls), SUM(sp.steals), SUM(sp.turnovers), SUM(sp.blocks), SUM(sp.points) AS sumPoints, AVG(sp.points) AS avgPoints, COUNT(idGame) AS TotGame FROM statsplayer sp LEFT JOIN game g ON sp.idGame=g.id WHERE g.season=:inputSeason AND sp.idPlayer=:inputIdPlayer ", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> findSumStatsPlayerAndAvgPointsByIdPlayerAndSeason(@Param("inputIdPlayer") int idPlayer, @Param("inputSeason") int season)
      Retrieves the sum of various player statistics and average points for a specific player and season.
      Parameters:
      idPlayer - The ID of the player for which to retrieve stats.
      season - The season for which to retrieve stats.
      Returns:
      List of Object arrays representing the sum of player statistics and average points. [Sum of FGM, Sum of FGA, Sum of FG%, Sum of FTM, Sum of FTA, Sum of FT%, Sum of TPM, Sum of TPA, Sum of TP%, Sum of Offensive Rebounds, Sum of Defensive Rebounds, Sum of Total Rebounds, Sum of Assists, Sum of Personal Fouls, Sum of Steals, Sum of Turnovers, Sum of Blocks, Sum of Points, Average Points, Total Games Played]

    • findLastTeamPlayer

      @Query(value="SELECT sp.idTeam FROM statsplayer sp left JOIN game g on sp.idGame = g.id where sp.idPlayer=:inputIdPlayer AND g.season=:inputSeason ORDER by g.date DESC LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) Integer findLastTeamPlayer(@Param("inputIdPlayer") int idPlayer, @Param("inputSeason") int season)
      Retrieves the ID of the last team a player played for in a specific season.
      Parameters:
      idPlayer - The ID of the player for which to retrieve the last team.
      season - The season for which to retrieve the last team.
      Returns:
      The ID of the last team the specified player played for in the specified season.

    • findByPlayerAndGame

      StatsPlayer findByPlayerAndGame(Player player, Game game)
      Retrieves the StatsPlayer entity for a specific player and game.
      Parameters:
      player - The player for which to retrieve stats.
      game - The game for which to retrieve stats.
      Returns:
      The StatsPlayer entity for the specified player and game or null if not found.

    • findSumDataIdPlayerAndSeason

      @Query(value="SELECT SUM(sp.points), SUM(sp.totReb), SUM(sp.assists), SUM(sp.fgm),SUM(sp.ftm), SUM(sp.tpm) FROM statsplayer sp left JOIN game g ON g.id = sp.idGame WHERE idPlayer=:inputIdPlayer AND g.season=:inputSeason", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer[]> findSumDataIdPlayerAndSeason(@Param("inputIdPlayer") int idPlayer, @Param("inputSeason") int season)
      Retrieves the sum of various player statistics for a specific player and season.
      Parameters:
      idPlayer - The ID of the player for which to retrieve stats.
      season - The season for which to retrieve stats.
      Returns:
      List of Integer arrays representing the sum of player statistics. [Sum of Points, Sum of Total Rebounds, Sum of Assists, Sum of Field Goals Made, Sum of Free Throws Made, Sum of Three-Pointers Made]

    • findidTeamByPlayerAndGame

      @Query(value="SELECT sp.idTeam FROM statsplayer sp WHERE sp.idPlayer=:inputIdPlayer and sp.idGame=:inputIdGame", nativeQuery=true) Integer findidTeamByPlayerAndGame(@Param("inputIdPlayer") int idPlayer, @Param("inputIdGame") int idGame)
      Retrieves the team ID for a specific player and game.
      Parameters:
      idPlayer - The ID of the player for which to retrieve the team ID.
      idGame - The ID of the game for which to retrieve the team ID.
      Returns:
      The team ID for the specified player and game.
